title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Integrated Pedagogy Workshop for Global Classroom Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories of education and multicultural education experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply a learning design framework reflecting cultural contexts in a global classroom environment.
Learners establish practical strategies to foster learner engagement and an inclusive educational environment using integrated pedagogical approaches.

Learners can design customer interaction scenario-based learning activities at least twice a month using basic smartphone functions (camera, recording, notes) and produce self-directed learning reports meeting at least four out of five predefined evaluation checklist criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
